testcase.name: Add a new user successfully
testcase.system-out: Given I have a user with name "John Doe", email "john@example.com", and age 30.passed When I add the user to the system...........................................passed Then the user should be saved successfully..................................passed And the response should contain the user details............................passed

testcase.name: Fail to add user with duplicate email
testcase.system-out: Given a user with email "john@example.com" already exists in the system.....passed When I try to add another user with email "john@example.com"................passed Then the system should return a duplicate email error.......................passed

testcase.name: Delete an existing user successfully
testcase.system-out: Given a user with ID exists in the system...................................passed When I delete the user......................................................passed Then the user should be removed from the system.............................passed

testcase.name: Fail to delete non-existent user
testcase.system-out: Given no user with ID 999 exists in the system..............................passed When I try to delete user with ID 999.......................................passed Then the system should return a user not found error........................passed
